goal.ch: 熟悉彎矩分配法和矩陣法之原理與分析方法
goal.en: To learn the principles and analysis procedures of moment distribution method, and matrix displacement methods for engineering structures.

outline.ch:
1. Moment distribution method
2. Matrix displacement method
3. Direct stiffness method
4. Energy method (option)
outline.en:
1. Moment distribution method
2. Matrix displacement method
3. Direct stiffness method
4. Energy method  (option)

textbook.ch:
Textbook:
Hibbeler, R.C., Structural Analysis, 9th Ed., Pearson.
References:
Hsieh, Y.Y. and Mau, S.T., Elementary Theory of Structures, 4th Ed., Prentice Hall
Tauchert, T.D., Energy Principles in Structural Mechanics, McGraw-Hill, (1974). 
Gere, J.M., Moment Distribution, D. Van Nostrand Company, Inc.
Holzer, S.M., Computer Analysis of Structures, Elsevier.
McGuire, W., Gallagher, R.H., and Ziemian, R.D., Matrix Structural Analysis, 2nd Ed., John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc. (2000)
Wang, C.-K., Matrix methods of structural analysis, Prentice Hall Inc. (1970),
Wang C.-K., Structural analysis on microcomputers, Macmillan (1986)
Wang C.-K., Computer methods in advanced structural analysis, Intext Educational Publishers (1973).
textbook.en:
Textbook:
Hibbeler, R.C., Structural Analysis, 9th Ed., Pearson.
References:
Hsieh, Y.Y. and Mau, S.T., Elementary Theory of Structures, 4th Ed., Prentice Hall
Tauchert, T.D., Energy Principles in Structural Mechanics, McGraw-Hill, (1974). 
Gere, J.M., Moment Distribution, D. Van Nostrand Company, Inc.
Holzer, S.M., Computer Analysis of Structures, Elsevier.
McGuire, W., Gallagher, R.H., and Ziemian, R.D., Matrix Structural Analysis, 2nd Ed., John Wiley ＆ Sons, Inc. (2000)
Wang, C.-K., Matrix methods of structural analysis, Prentice Hall Inc. (1970),
Wang C.-K., Structural analysis on microcomputers, Macmillan (1986)

gradMethod.ch:
Homework: 10％
Tests:
1.  Moment Distribution Method, 30％ 
2. Matrix Methods 30％
3. Direct Stiffness Methods 30％
gradMethod.en:
Homework: 10％
Tests:
1.  Moment Distribution Method, 30％ 
2. Matrix Methods 30％
3. Direct Stiffness Methods 30％

、

domain.en:

ch.competencies: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
工程技術與生態環境之互動
工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神

en.competencies: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing  Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical  Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

en: Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI2018 only.
Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementCI2019 only.
